all_text_timv: Plaça de toros monumental d'Andorra : I palau d'esports Lluna Park. Spain : T.G. Soler, 1973. 1 print : color ; 70 x 33 cm still image sti rdacontent unmediated n rdamedia sheet nb rdacarrier The poster depicts a bullfighter in green and gold waving a red cape over the shoulders of a charging bull (from an oil painting by Ballestar). It advertises a bullfight to take place on Sunday, 11 July [year not given] at the Monumental Bullring of Andorra and Luna Park Sports Palace with six bulls, featuring the toreadors Curro - Carro (Arles), Tony Pervenchon (Nimes), and El Extremeño (Nimes). In Catalan. Bullfights Pictorial works. Bullfighters Pictorial works. Posters. lcgft Ballestar, Vincenç, artist.

notes_summary_ssim: The poster depicts a bullfighter in green and gold waving a red cape over the shoulders of a charging bull (from an oil painting by Ballestar). It advertises a bullfight to take place on Sunday, 11 July [year not given] at the Monumental Bullring of Andorra and Luna Park Sports Palace with six bulls, featuring the toreadors Curro - Carro (Arles), Tony Pervenchon (Nimes), and El Extremeño (Nimes).
